scripts.install-all: yarn install && cd frontend && yarn install && cd ../backend && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && python -m uvicorn server:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port $PORT" "cd frontend && npx serve -s build -l 3000"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && python -m uvicorn server:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload" "cd frontend && yarn start"
